original_text: At one time, the Lord was happy to help you with good things. He gave you many children. But if you do not obey him, he will be happy to destroy you. He will remove you from the land that will soon become your new home.
korean_text: 여호와께서 너희에게 선을 행하시고 너희를 번성하게 하시기를 기뻐하시던 것 같이 이제는 여호와께서 너희를 망하게 하시며 멸하시기를 기뻐하시리니 너희가 들어가 차지할 땅에서 뽑힐 것이요

sentences.original_text: At one time, the Lord was happy to help you with good things.
sentences.korean_translation: 한때는 주께서 좋은 것으로 너를 돕기를 기뻐하셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: But if you do not obey him,
he will be happy to destroy you.
He will remove you from the land
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 너를 그 땅에서 쫓아낼 것입니다

sentences.original_text: that will soon become your new home.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 땅은 곧 너의 새로운 집이 될 것입니다.
